item.title: An Old William Lane Craig Debate
item.description:
Whilst looking at some William Lane Craig videos yesterday, I came across this one that I had not seen before.

I will be watching tomorrow, I just thought that given the age of the video, it would be interesting to share with others.

After watching, I shall update with my thoughts on the actual debate, and possibly commentary on how William Lane Craigs arguments have developed.
